title: Spicy Mashed Sweet Potato Fudge
directions: Coat a shallow glass pan with coconut oil spray. Set aside.
In a large bowl, combine melted chocolate chips, mashed sweet potato and cocoa powder. Add remaining ingredients and mix until fully combined.
Transfer gooey mixture to prepared pan and spread evenly with a spatula.
Cover with saran wrap or wax paper and refrigerate approximately 4 hours.
To serve, slice into bite-size cubes.
ingredients: 1 cup mashed sweet potato (about 1 large sweet potato)
2 Tbsp. unsweetened vanilla macadamia nut milk
1/8 tsp. ground chipotle chili pepper, optional
